info.title: AcademicCurriculumAcademicUnitContact
info.description: This service returns a listing of contacts within an academic unit, some of which include the advisement center, the chair, and the grad secretary.

put.summary: Inserts a new academic unit contact. Note cannot create duplicate contacts with the same unit id, contact type, person_id, effective_id and expired_date

put.summary: Updates an academic unit contact or inserts a new one. Note, if the specified update is not found, an insert is performed using current date as effective date, and 31 Dec 2999 as expired date.
